attributes.action: Abolish all tolls/charges for use of the Dartford Bridge/Tunnel facilities.
attributes.additional_details: Government are creating overly vexatious fines (£37.50/£72) per journey for use of the Bridge and this can result in someone who has innocently forgot to pay a weeks worth of tolls (even if they are willing to pay them once they get a reminder) anything up to £600. Additionally, if they are driving a hire car, the hire companies are extorting anything up to the same amount as admin fees. This can result in £1200 in fine for a bit of absent-mindedness.
attributes.background: The Dartford Bridge toll charge was to be abolished once it had been paid for. This has now been withdrawn, despite the Bridge being paid for many times over.

rejection.details:
Sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119254
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
